Title: P-5 WAIST SECTION
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Waist section

2.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = Port Gunner; 3,4 = Starboard Gunner; 5 = Ball Gunner; 6 = Fire, Waist oxygen out

sub_roll.6: Fire, Waist oxygen out - roll to extinguish on Table BL-3

3.description: Roll 1D: 1-3 = Port gun out; 4-6 = Starboard gun out

6.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

8.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

9.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = roll wound for gunner on Table BL-4; 3 = gunner's heat out; 4,5 = guns out; 6 = turret mechanism inoperable

sub_roll.1-2: Roll wound for Ball Gunner on Table BL-4
sub_roll.6: Ball turret mechanism inoperable - gunner trapped

notes: If result is 6: Gunner is trapped in turret, may not fire guns, and may not bail out. If landing gear is inoperable, gunner is automatically KIA on landing.

10.description: Roll wound for each waist gunner on Table BL-4

11.description: Roll 1D: 1-3 = Port Gunner heat out; 4-6 = Starboard Gunner heat out

12.description: See effect for roll of 12 on Pilot Compartment Table P-2

notes: a) See rules section Oxygen Out.
b) See rules section Heat Out/Frostbite.
c) Gunner is trapped in turret, may not fire guns, and may not bail out. If landing gear is inoperable, gunner is automatically KIA on landing.
